testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to delete the course information with the specified ID via an API connection.
testcase.name: When a DELETE request with valid authorization information and correct data (id) is sent to the
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/deleteCourse/2392" path parameters.................passed * The api user sends a DELETE request and saves the returned response.......passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed * The api user confirms that the remark information in the response body is "success"..passed * The api user verifies that the Message information in the response body is "Successfully Deleted.".passed * The api user verifies that the "Deleted Course ID" information in the returned response body is the same as the id path parameter written in the endpoint..passed
